h2_title: The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines
h3_title: Relief of the Fallen Loong Luojia Fragrant Vine
content: The Relief of the Fallen Loong is both difficult to find and reach. Start by defeating the Buddha's Right Hand. Run over the bridge it creates and drop to the platform below. Turn right and head over the rope bridge on the left. Make your way past the hanging webs over the next rope bridge and escape to the forest. The vine is hanging from a tree on the edge of the cliff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'Relief of the Fallen Loong Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
The Relief of the Fallen Loong is both difficult to find and reach. Start by defeating the Buddha's Right Hand. Run over the bridge it creates and drop to the platform below. Turn right and head over the rope bridge on the left. Make your way past the hanging webs over the next rope bridge and escape to the forest. The vine is hanging from a tree on the edge of the cliff.
